item.title: whoa
item.description: So Microsoft wants to control the national ID initiative with its .NET passport system. They want to issue every citizen a passport and then use the insecure protocol to run the national ID system. I guess what is worse, is that the U.S. is considering useing the technology. damn. I don’t know what to think. I think that maybe it would be cool. In that sort of wierd shadowrun kind of way.
